channel.title: scientist on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in scientist on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LfE 13: The last day and the Bicycle story
item.description: 06/12/2009 Hello! It’s nearly noon on this bright sunshiny Sunday. The temperature is 8 Degrees Celsius. Last night it hit an unusual 9 degrees! I had planned to pull out my gloves only after December started but I remember November days being colder than this!

item.title: My first Entrepreneurship workshop
item.description: Yesterday I was in Bremen for my first Entrepreneurship workshop. I had heard of them ever since my undergrad but I was never that interested in it back then.
